solution_line_template: In a week, Mr. Alvarez uses ${weekly_spend}/${cost_per_gallon} = <<{weekly_spend}/{cost_per_gallon}={gallons_per_week}>>{gallons_per_week} gallons a week.
So in two weeks, he uses {gallons_per_week} x {number_of_weeks} = <<{gallons_per_week}*{number_of_weeks}={total_gallons}>>{total_gallons} gallons.
